java.io
接口 DataOutput

所有已知子接口：
ObjectOutput
所有已知实现类：
DataOutputStream, ObjectOutputStream, RandomAccessFile
public interface DataOutput

Defines an interface for classes that are able to write typed data to some target. Typically, this data can be read in by a class which implements DataInput. Types that can be written include byte, 16-bit short, 32-bit int, 32-bit float, 64-bit long, 64-bit double, byte strings, and MUTF-8 encoded strings.

从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataOutputStream, RandomAccessFile

方法摘要
 void write(byte[] buffer)
          Writes the entire contents of the byte array buffer to this stream.
 void write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)
          Writes count bytes from the byte array buffer starting at offset index.
 void write(int oneByte)
          Writes the specified 8-bit byte.
 void writeBoolean(boolean val)
          Writes the specified boolean.
 void writeByte(int val)
          Writes the specified 8-bit byte.
 void writeBytes(String str)
          Writes the low order 8-bit bytes from the specified string.
 void writeChar(int val)
          Writes the specified 16-bit character.
 void writeChars(String str)
          Writes the 16-bit characters contained in str.
 void writeDouble(double val)
          Writes the specified 64-bit double.
 void writeFloat(float val)
          Writes the specified 32-bit float.
 void writeInt(int val)
          Writes the specified 32-bit int.
 void writeLong(long val)
          Writes the specified 64-bit long.
 void writeShort(int val)
          Writes the specified 16-bit short.
 void writeUTF(String str)
          Writes the specified string encoded in modified UTF-8.
 

方法详细信息

write

void write(byte[] buffer)
           throws IOException
Writes the entire contents of the byte array buffer to this stream.

参数：
buffer - the buffer to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readFully(byte[]), DataInput.readFully(byte[], int, int)

write

void write(byte[] buffer,
           int offset,
           int count)
           throws IOException
Writes count bytes from the byte array buffer starting at offset index.

参数：
buffer - the buffer to write.
offset - the index of the first byte in buffer to write.
count - the number of bytes from the buffer to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readFully(byte[]), DataInput.readFully(byte[], int, int)

write

void write(int oneByte)
           throws IOException
Writes the specified 8-bit byte.

参数：
oneByte - the byte to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readByte()

writeBoolean

void writeBoolean(boolean val)
                  throws IOException
Writes the specified boolean.

参数：
val - the boolean value to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readBoolean()

writeByte

void writeByte(int val)
               throws IOException
Writes the specified 8-bit byte.

参数：
val - the byte value to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readByte(), DataInput.readUnsignedByte()

writeBytes

void writeBytes(String str)
                throws IOException
Writes the low order 8-bit bytes from the specified string.

参数：
str - the string containing the bytes to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readFully(byte[]), DataInput.readFully(byte[],int,int)

writeChar

void writeChar(int val)
               throws IOException
Writes the specified 16-bit character. Only the two least significant bytes of the integer oneByte are written, with the higher one written first. This represents the Unicode value of the char.

参数：
val - the character to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readChar()

writeChars

void writeChars(String str)
                throws IOException
Writes the 16-bit characters contained in str.

参数：
str - the string that contains the characters to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readChar()

writeDouble

void writeDouble(double val)
                 throws IOException
Writes the specified 64-bit double. The resulting output is the eight bytes returned by Double.doubleToLongBits(double).

参数：
val - the double to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readDouble()

writeFloat

void writeFloat(float val)
                throws IOException
Writes the specified 32-bit float. The resulting output is the four bytes returned by Float.floatToIntBits(float).

参数：
val - the float to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readFloat()

writeInt

void writeInt(int val)
              throws IOException
Writes the specified 32-bit int. The resulting output is the four bytes, highest order first, of val.

参数：
val - the int to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readInt()

writeLong

void writeLong(long val)
               throws IOException
Writes the specified 64-bit long. The resulting output is the eight bytes, highest order first, of val.

参数：
val - the long to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readLong()

writeShort

void writeShort(int val)
                throws IOException
Writes the specified 16-bit short. Only the lower two bytes of val are written with the higher one written first.

参数：
val - the short to write.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readShort(), DataInput.readUnsignedShort()

writeUTF

void writeUTF(String str)
              throws IOException
Writes the specified string encoded in modified UTF-8.

参数：
str - the string to write encoded in modified UTF-8.
抛出：
IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing.
从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
另请参见：
DataInput.readUTF()
